col.anyType: |Data Inputs|( 'Gold' ) .Values( |DataSource| + ' ' + Label, Property( Item.Database, Item.Code, |Property|, Item.CodeType, |DataSource| ).Data( Column_5, Column_6, "1P") * |Scale| ) .Where( Column_2 != NULL )
Values( |Maturity Far Leg|('Murex'), |Value Under Test Far Leg|('Internal') ).MAKESERIES(0,1)

col.string: DatabaseItems("\\\MD_SILVER", "Murex Trades Currency", "", "*") .Items.Where( (Transaction Type ='XSW') AND Transaction Family = 'CURR' AND Transaction Group='FXD' AND |Date Under Test| = Value(%RunDate%))
